title: Top Down Character System With Fantasy Golems
description: This is a top down character animation and interaction system with fantasy golem characters.
longDescription:
Thank you for downloading Top-Down Character System with Fantasy Golem.


This package has customizable characters which can perform basic actions

and are ready to be included in your game whether its a top down, RTS or hack and slash.

The characters are set up so that you can easily extend their functionality or make 

your own characters in a similar manner using this system.


Note that Golems are reskinned UE4 mannequins being used for demo purposes, and not

entirely custom characters.


In this package you will find a rigged and animated basic default character,

as well as different types of fantasy golems which inherit blueprint logic from it. 

Basic character has 16 unique animations,

Golem characters have their own 36 animations.

With this parent blueprint setup editing and branching into new characters will be easy.

We are planning on releasing more elaborate custom characters on this system in the future.

Main blueprints included are the BP_Character and BP_Golem. 

There is also BP_Character_Data and a widget WBP_CharacterPanel - which help initialize and control characters in the test level. In the game characters can be controlled using the aforementioned widget and demonstrate 

various functionality such as, walking, turning, attacking, customizing features, dying etc...


The characters are fully rigged and compatible with unreal skeleton. 

Re targeting and remapping of any unreal animation should be easy and smooth. IK bones are included.

In case you wanted to create more animations or edit existing ones - source Maya animation files

and rigs are included as well. 

Project includes sound effects for all characters weapons and attacks. As characters perform different actions the sounds

will be played automatically. Footsteps will adjust to character armor type. This can all be configured or disabled in blueprints.


For fantasy golems we included weapons with sounds and animations such as:

dagger, sword, vampiric sword, long sword, mace, morgenstern, crossbow, bow, shield - weapons can be combined and configured in the menus - you can choose primary and secondary weapon.

Fantasy golems have 4 armor variants which can be switched in the menu

They also have 8 cape color variants which can be switched in the menu displaying in the test level.

They have 4 different head props (helmets) which can be switched in the menu

You can change character colors by overriding the RGBA value in the menu. Weapons and capes will also be affected.


If you want to have a glimpse at what's included in the package watch the manual video at:

https://youtu.be/0BsiHaId9bc


For more comprehensive text manual go to:

https://kornica3d.click/manuals/golem.txt


If there are questions emails us at kornica3d(at)gmail(dot)com
technicalDetails:
Main Features: 


Top down character system developed for top down games such as:

real time strategy

turn based game 

hack and slash


Included test level contains all the blueprints and their functionality.

In the system we have default character blueprint and fantasy golem character blueprint.

Golem inherits from default character which makes it easy to edit and extend.

Rig and animation files are included.


Characters included (reskinned UE4 mannequins for demo purposes)

- default character - master class

- customizable golem character - 4 armor variants, 4 head props, 4 capes (child class)


Golem customizations: 

4 different armor variants

8 cape colors

4 head props

9 weapons

* changing character color (also basic character)


Rigged

Rigged to Epic skeleton

IK bones


Animations: 

36 for golem character

16 for default character


Animation types (In-place): 

walk, run, idle, stand, hurt, die, dead, defend, attack, win, lose, lose_idle, 

ability - kick, ability - power up, ability - cast spell,

attack and defends animations for provided weapons.


Texture Res: 2048x2048


Platforms: Windows


Video Documentation: https://youtu.be/0BsiHaId9bc

Blueprints Text Manual: https://kornica3d.click/manuals/golem.txt


Important/Additional Notes:

Some animations have multiple variants, make sure to check them as well.

Sounds for major character actions are included.


In case you have any question email: kornica3d(at)gmail(dot)com
